# PitchPubs
# The best soccer bars in America — curated for fans who want the real match-day experience.
#
# This file helps AI crawlers understand the site.
# See: https://llmstxt.org

> PitchPubs is a curated directory of 480+ soccer-friendly bars across 60+ US cities. Find the best spots to watch Premier League, MLS, Champions League, and World Cup 2026 matches.

## Pages
- / — Homepage with featured bars and state filters
- /bars — Browse all soccer bars with filters
- /states — Browse bars by state
- /cities — Browse bars by city
- /categories — All categories
- /search — Search the directory
- /about — About PitchPubs
- /faq — Frequently asked questions
- /contact — Get in touch
- /submit — Submit a new bar

## API
- /api/items — List bars (supports ?category, ?state, ?city, ?q, ?limit, ?offset)
- /api/items/[slug] — Single bar detail
- /api/categories — All categories with counts
- /api/states — States with bar counts
- /api/cities — Cities with bar counts

## Full Data
- /llms-full.txt — Complete database dump with all bars and content
